body_text:
Yeah, this in JS is... interesting.
As an alternative, you could also pass list2.includes.bind(list2) which avoids explicitly declaring another function (but doesn't otherwise make much of a difference).
body:
Yeah, `this` in JS is... interesting.

As an alternative, you could also pass `list2.includes.bind(list2)` which avoids explicitly declaring another function (but doesn't otherwise make much of a difference). <insert shruggy emoticon here>
body_html:
Yeah, this in JS is... interesting.

As an alternative, you could also pass list2.includes.bind(list2) which avoids explicitly declaring another function (but doesn't otherwise make much of a difference).
